title: Illusory love
description: This is a story, where it has both sides of the coin.One side it is ‘love’ which humans kneel and on the other side ‘money’ where they seek incessantly.Lany will need to know which side she must follow on, that is, living near her only love, or she must risk a new life in the capital and be flattered by wealth, which she mutually dreams.
author: Pet Torres
